animeTitle: Pokemon Best Wishes! Season 2: Iris vs. Ibuki! Dragon Master e no Michi!!
otherNames: Pokemon Best Wishes! Season 2: Decolora Adventure - Iris vs. Ibuki! Dragon Master e no Michi!!, アイリスVSイブキ！ドラゴンマスターへの道！！
synopsis: Iris vs Ibuki! The Road to Become a Dragon Master!! is the second spin off of the Best Wishes series of the Pokémon anime.
